ListScrapers.name: ListScrapers
ListScrapers.documentation: Lists all scrapers in a customer account, including scrapers being created or deleted. You may provide filters to return a more specific list of results.

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.documentation: Lists the tags you have assigned to the resource.

ListWorkspaces.name: ListWorkspaces
ListWorkspaces.documentation: Lists all AMP workspaces, including workspaces being created or deleted.

AccessDeniedException.documentation: User does not have sufficient access to perform this action.

createdAt.documentation: The time when the alert manager definition was created.

modifiedAt.documentation: The time when the alert manager definition was modified.

AlertManagerDefinitionDescription.documentation: Represents the properties of an alert manager definition.

ConflictException.documentation: Updating or deleting a resource can cause an inconsistent state.

workspaceId.documentation: The ID of the workspace in which to create the alert manager definition.

clientToken.documentation: Optional, unique, case-sensitive, user-provided identifier to ensure the idempotency of the request.

CreateAlertManagerDefinitionRequest.documentation: Represents the input of a CreateAlertManagerDefinition operation.

CreateAlertManagerDefinitionResponse.documentation: Represents the output of a CreateAlertManagerDefinition operation.

workspaceId.documentation: The ID of the workspace to vend logs to.

logGroupArn.documentation: The ARN of the CW log group to which the vended log data will be published.

clientToken.documentation: Optional, unique, case-sensitive, user-provided identifier to ensure the idempotency of the request.

CreateLoggingConfigurationResponse.documentation: Represents the output of a CreateLoggingConfiguration operation.

workspaceId.documentation: The ID of the workspace in which to create the rule group namespace.

data.documentation: The namespace data that define the rule groups.

clientToken.documentation: Optional, unique, case-sensitive, user-provided identifier to ensure the idempotency of the request.

tags.documentation: Optional, user-provided tags for this rule groups namespace.

CreateRuleGroupsNamespaceRequest.documentation: Represents the input of a CreateRuleGroupsNamespace operation.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this rule groups namespace.

tags.documentation: The tags of this rule groups namespace.

CreateRuleGroupsNamespaceResponse.documentation: Represents the output of a CreateRuleGroupsNamespace operation.

alias.documentation: An optional user-assigned alias for this scraper. This alias is for user reference and does not need to be unique.

scrapeConfiguration.documentation: The configuration used to create the scraper.

source.documentation: The source that the scraper will be discovering and collecting metrics from.

destination.documentation: The destination that the scraper will be producing metrics to.

clientToken.documentation: Optional, unique, case-sensitive, user-provided identifier to ensure the idempotency of the request.

CreateScraperRequest.documentation: Represents the input of a CreateScraper operation.

scraperId.documentation: The generated ID of the scraper that was just created.

arn.documentation: The ARN of the scraper that was just created.

status.documentation: The status of the scraper that was just created (usually CREATING).

CreateScraperResponse.documentation: Represents the output of a CreateScraper operation.

alias.documentation: An optional user-assigned alias for this workspace. This alias is for user reference and does not need to be unique.

clientToken.documentation: Optional, unique, case-sensitive, user-provided identifier to ensure the idempotency of the request.

kmsKeyArn.documentation: Optional, customer managed KMS key used to encrypt data for this workspace

CreateWorkspaceRequest.documentation: Represents the input of a CreateWorkspace operation.

workspaceId.documentation: The generated ID of the workspace that was just created.

arn.documentation: The ARN of the workspace that was just created.

status.documentation: The status of the workspace that was just created (usually CREATING).

kmsKeyArn.documentation: Customer managed KMS key ARN for this workspace

CreateWorkspaceResponse.documentation: Represents the output of a CreateWorkspace operation.

securityGroupIds.documentation: A list of security group IDs specified for VPC configuration.

subnetIds.documentation: A list of subnet IDs specified for VPC configuration.

IamRoleArn.documentation: An ARN identifying an IAM role used by the scraper.

IdempotencyToken.documentation: An identifier used to ensure the idempotency of a write request.

retryAfterSeconds.documentation: Advice to clients on when the call can be safely retried.

name.documentation: Optional filter for rule groups namespace name. Only the rule groups namespace that begin with this value will be returned.

nextToken.documentation: Pagination token to request the next page in a paginated list. This token is obtained from the output of the previous ListRuleGroupsNamespaces request.

maxResults.documentation: Maximum results to return in response (default=100, maximum=1000).

ruleGroupsNamespaces.documentation: The list of the selected rule groups namespaces.

nextToken.documentation: Pagination token to use when requesting the next page in this list.

nextToken.documentation: Pagination token to request the next page in a paginated list. This token is obtained from the output of the previous ListScrapers request.

maxResults.documentation: Maximum results to return in response (default=100, maximum=1000).

ListScrapersRequest.documentation: Represents the input of a ListScrapers operation.

scrapers.documentation: The list of scrapers, filtered down if a set of filters was provided in the request.

nextToken.documentation: Pagination token to use when requesting the next page in this list.

ListScrapersResponse.documentation: Represents the output of a ListScrapers operation.

nextToken.documentation: Pagination token to request the next page in a paginated list. This token is obtained from the output of the previous ListWorkspaces request.

alias.documentation: Optional filter for workspace alias. Only the workspaces with aliases that begin with this value will be returned.

maxResults.documentation: Maximum results to return in response (default=100, maximum=1000).

workspaces.documentation: The list of existing workspaces, including those undergoing creation or deletion.

arn.documentation: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of this scraper.

lastModifiedAt.documentation: The time when the scraper was last modified.

source.documentation: The source that the scraper is discovering and collecting metrics from.

destination.documentation: The destination that the scraper is producing metrics to.

value.documentation: The values of the given key to filter by.

serviceCode.documentation: Service Quotas requirement to identify originating service.

quotaCode.documentation: Service Quotas requirement to identify originating quota.

ServiceQuotaExceededException.documentation: Request would cause a service quota to be exceeded.

Source.documentation: A representation of a source that a scraper can discover and collect metrics from.

SubnetIds.documentation: A list of subnet IDs specified for VPC configuration.

key.documentation:
The key of the tag.

Constraints: Tag keys are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 128 Unicode characters. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @ May not begin with aws:.

value.documentation:
The value of the tag.

Constraints: Tag values are case-sensitive and accept a maximum of 256 Unicode characters. Valid characters are Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @

TagMap.documentation: The list of tags assigned to the resource.

serviceCode.documentation: Service Quotas requirement to identify originating service.

quotaCode.documentation: Service Quotas requirement to identify originating quota.

retryAfterSeconds.documentation: Advice to clients on when the call can be safely retried.

fieldList.documentation: The field that caused the error, if applicable. If more than one field caused the error, pick one and elaborate in the message.

ValidationException.documentation: The input fails to satisfy the constraints specified by an AWS service.

message.documentation: Message describing why the field failed validation.

ValidationExceptionField.documentation: Stores information about a field passed inside a request that resulted in an exception.
